name: Nordlicht
summary: Nordlicht is an adventure-game where you accompany an unusual family on its fascinating journey to the cold north. During the journey, they encounter mysterious star-signs of the polar night, and have to overcome nature's dangers to confront their fears.
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: AVG
  • 游玩人数: 1人
  • 发行日期: 2019年9月27日
  • 售价: 22RMB
  • 官方网站: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1089310/Nordlicht/
  • 开发: illius
  • 发行: Sedoc LLC
